name: LastTenSeconds
tagline: had to be am LudumDare 27 game...
body:
### LastTenSeconds

Was going to be our game on the theme "10 seconds" for LD27. Unfortunately we didn't finish it in time to enter the Jam :-(
Anyway it was nearly done so we let it here. Hope you like it at least during its ten seconds gameplay :-)
By (Bware studios)[http://bwarestudios.com]

### Download and play

- Mac version (LastTenSeconds.app.zip)[http://bwarestudios.com]
- Android version (LastTenSeconds-debug.apk)[http://bwarestudios.com]
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
